title: Verify that 'Create Event' button isn't enabled when 'Event image' is blank
steps: Fill in 'Event Name' field with valid data, e.g. 'eventName'
Pick up any valid date range at 'Duration' date-picker
Fill in 'Event URL' field with valid url including 'https://' prefix
Select any checkbox at 'Appearance type' section
Fill in 'Short Description' field with text with min 100 characters and max 500
result: 'Create Event' button should not be enabled

title: Verify that 'Create Event' button isn't enabled when 'Event Name' is blank
steps: Upload any valid WEBP, JPG or PNG image with up to 300 KB size at 'Event image' section
Pick up any valid date range at 'Duration' date-picker
Fill in 'Event URL' field with valid url including 'https://' prefix
Select any checkbox at 'Appearance type' section
Fill in 'Short Description' field with text with min 100 characters and max 500
result: 'Create Event' button should not be enabled

title: Verify that user isn't able to fill in 'Event URL' field without 'https://' prefix
steps: Fill in 'Event URL' field with a valid URL without 'https://' prefix
result: 'URLs must contain https:// prefix' notification should appear
'Event URL' field should be highlighted in red
